main.name: Dan Ogrodnik
main.bio: Dan Ogrodnik is a web developer, digital artist, and audio engineer with a background in web design and e-commerce. Well versed in a variety of design and multimedia software and programming languages, Dan creates engaging, beautifully designed experiences across a multitude of platforms and formats. Originally from Connecticut, Dan holds degrees from California Institute of the Arts and the University of Hartford. He currently resides in Los Angeles where he is an avid snowboarder, cyclist, and coffee drinker.
main.contactmessage: Questions, comments, concerns? Drop me a line!

resume.skillmessage: Dan has a background in HTML, CSS, Javascript, Python, Ruby, React, Liquid, Shopify, Wordpress, MySQL, Bootstrap, Photoshop, Illustrator, MaxMSP, Ableton Live, and more.

work.title: Junior Front-end Developer
work.description: Utilizes Shopify and Wordpress to create and maintain user interfaces and implement front-end website design.

work.title: Front-end Developer
work.description: Develops and maintains user interfaces and implements design, builds reusable code and libraries for future use, and optimizes applications for maximum speed and scalability

work.title: Staff Accompanist
work.description: Accompanies college-level dance classes including Contemporary, Ballet, Afro-Cuban, Partnering, Hip-Hop, Jazz, Commercial Dance, Dunham Technique, Improvisation, guest clinicians and more

work.title: Chief Operating Officer
work.description: COO of a multinational talent provider handling large-scale event production, which produced 350+ events abroad in a 3-month period for MAC Cosmetics Magic of the Night campaign
